card.name: Humble Harvester
card.text: When this creature enters, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.") Whenever you sacrifice a noncreature permanent, create a 1/1 white Human creature token. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Stash Away
card.text: Create a 1/1 white Mouse creature token and a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.") Flashback {2}{W}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Waterfront Lurkers
card.text: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, surveil X, where X is its power. (To surveil X, look at the top X cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Eve, the Haunt's Heart
card.text: [+2]: Up to one target creature gets +2/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn. [-1]: Create a 1/1 black Zombie Cat creature token with "When this creature dies, target opponent discards a card at random." [-6]: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice a non-Demon creature. If you do, create a 4/4 black Demon creature token with menace."

card.name: Fatal Flaw
card.text: Destroy target creature with mana value 2 or less. Cycling {B} ({B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Gloomwing Occultist
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 black Bird creature token with flying and "This creature can't block." This ability triggers only once each turn. Nocturnal {1}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell for its nocturnal cost. If you do, it enters tapped with a stun counter on it. Remove one instead of untapping.)

card.name: Rotcycle Myconid
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, put a spore counter on this creature. {B}, Remove X spore counters from this creature: Return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. (If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)

card.name: Smoke Seer
card.text: Reap—{1}{B}{R}: You lose 1 life and you draw a card. (Activate this ability only once each turn and only as a sorcery. It costs {0} if a creature you controlled died this turn.)

card.name: Herald of the Stampede
card.text: Haste Other creatures you control have haste. Nocturnal {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its nocturnal cost. If you do, it enters tapped with a stun counter on it. Remove one instead of untapping.)

card.name: Lurholme Flamedancer
card.text: Whenever this creature attacks, discard a card, then draw a card. If you discarded an instant or sorcery card this way, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token that's tapped and attacking.

card.name: Trial by Fire
card.text: When this enchantment enters, create two 1/1 red Elemental creature tokens with haste. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {R}. If you do, create a 1/1 red Elemental creature token with haste.

card.name: Ulderwild Alpha
card.text: Trample Other Wolves you control have trample. When this creature enters, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Ulderwild Packmate and put it onto the battlefield. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

card.name: Ulderwild Packmate
card.text: Whenever this creature attacks, if you control at least two other creatures named Ulderwild Packmate, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Jack's Last Laugh
card.text: Flash When this enchantment enters, if you cast it, destroy up to one target nonland permanent. {6}{B}{G}, Exile this enchantment: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Timeworn Woodsman
card.text: Menace Whenever this creature attacks, you may sacrifice a land. If you do, draw a card, then create a 0/1 red and green Treefolk creature token with "This creature gets +1/+0 for each land card in your graveyard."

card.name: Tinea's Doomsinger
card.text: Flying {3}{W}{B}, Exile five creature cards from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of this creature.

card.name: Wandering Balladeer
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put your choice of a flying, vigilance, or trample counter on this creature. If this creature already has each of those counters on it, instead put three +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Convergence Mirror
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay its mana cost. If you do, copy that spell. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.) {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.

card.name: Skittering Slicer
Revenant Lantern
card.text: When this artifact enters, exile target card from a graveyard. {1}, {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard. {5}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of card types among cards exiled with this artifact.

card.name: Zombie Cat X24
card.text: When this creature dies, target opponent discards a card at random.

card.name: Treefolk X24
card.text: This creature gets +1/+0 for each land card in your graveyard.

card.name: Food X24
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.

card.name: Adler of the Thirteenth Hour
card.text: Menace Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) Whenever Adler attacks, you may cast a noncreature spell from your hand with mana value less than or equal to her power without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Mind's Unraveling
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. If you've cast another spell this turn, instead counter that spell, then surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

card.name: Herald of the Heavens
card.text: Flying At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control. Nocturnal {2}{W} (You may cast this spell for its nocturnal cost. If you do, it enters tapped with a stun counter on it. Remove one instead of untapping.)

card.name: Wonder Why
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Equinox {2}{U}{B} (If you cast this spell from your hand for its equinox cost, exile it. At your next upkeep, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Murktown Angler
card.text: {U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. {4}{U}{U}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Create a 7/7 blue Leviathan creature token. Activate only if there are seven or more cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Treetop Cover
card.text: Flash Enchant creature When this Aura enters, enchanted creature gains hexproof until end of turn. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

card.name: Crooked Fieldwatcher
card.text: Vigilance Other Scarecrows you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance. Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 1/1 Scarecrow artifact creature in addition to its other types.

card.name: Blighted Stocktender
card.text: Reap—{3}{B}{B}: Create a black Ox Spirit creature token with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard." (Activate this ability only once each turn and only as a sorcery. It costs {0} if a creature you controlled died this turn.)

card.name: Demon X24
card.text: Menace

card.name: Bird X24
card.text: Flying This creature can't block.

card.name: Elemental X24
card.text: Haste

card.name: Seek What Was Lost
card.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library and separate them into two piles. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put that pile into your hand. You may cast a spell from the other pile without paying its mana cost. Put the rest of the cards into your graveyard.

card.name: Tarnahm Redeemer
card.text: Flash When this creature enters, if you cast it, return to the battlefield all creature cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn. Put a finality counter on each of them. (If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)

card.name: Prowling Mastiff
card.text: Vigilance Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.) Whenever a land card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, create a 1/1 green Dog creature token with vigilance.

card.name: Dog X24
card.text: Vigilance

card.name: Ox Spirit X24
card.text: This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Earthshaker Colossus
card.text: This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control. You may look at the top card of your library at any time, and you may play lands from the top of your library. Nocturnal {2}{G} (You may cast this spell for its nocturnal cost. If you do, it enters tapped with a stun counter on it. Remove one instead of untapping.)
